item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurants bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Whiskey Republic, 515 S. Water St. (this is the area with a few bars across from Narragansett Electric and in front of the hurricane barrier on the water) So Whiskey Republic is where Fish Company "used to be". Rumor has it that its a great place and the deck is fabulous. Of course the weather may not cooperate, but the view is sure to be good. I have another commitment after work and will be there on the later side, but I'm confident that you all know what to do! If someone would like to volunteer to host, please write it in your response, so people can look for you. So let's check it out!

PLEASE RSVP!!!!

Hope to see you there! Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I can't host this week due to a possible work conflict, but you know what to do! If you see anyone who looks confused - say hello!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Whiskey Republic!
